keyEvents.title: Luffy Attempts to Break Through Admirals
keyEvents.description: Luffy tries to slip past the admirals in the plaza but is knocked down by Kizaru.

keyEvents.title: Marco Protects Luffy from Aokiji
keyEvents.description: Marco intervenes to save Luffy from Aokiji's attack in the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo vs Crocodile
keyEvents.description: Doflamingo and Crocodile fight in the plaza after Crocodile saves Ace.

keyEvents.title: Oars Jr. Propels Ship into Plaza
keyEvents.description: Oars Jr. uses his last strength to propel the coated paddle ship into the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Pirates Reach the Plaza
keyEvents.description: The Whitebeard Pirates successfully breach Marineford's defenses and enter the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard's Massive Shockwave
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard unleashes a devastating shockwave attack upon entering the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Kibin's Debut
keyEvents.description: Commodore Kibin attempts to stop Luffy in the plaza.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard's Coated Ship Surfaces
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard's hidden coated paddle ship surfaces from the bay, revealing his trump card strategy.

name.japanese: マリンフォード処刑台

keyEvents.title: Sengoku Orders Immediate Execution
keyEvents.description: Sengoku orders Ace to be executed immediately on the platform.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Saves Ace
keyEvents.description: Crocodile intervenes to save Ace from execution on the platform.

keyEvents.title: Sengoku and Garp Prepare to Fight
keyEvents.description: Both Sengoku and Garp decide to enter the battle from the execution platform.

name.japanese: マリンフォード地下通路

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3 Infiltrates Underground
keyEvents.description: Galdino successfully infiltrates the underground passages beneath Marineford.
